solution_line_template: The dragon stole {multiplier_crown_jewels} * {jewels_stolen_by_king} = <<{multiplier_crown_jewels}*{jewels_stolen_by_king}={crown_jewels_stolen}>>{crown_jewels_stolen} of the king’s crown jewels.
The dragon owned {crown_jewels_stolen} * {fraction_new_to_old} = <<{crown_jewels_stolen}*{fraction_new_to_old}={jewels_before_theft}>>{jewels_before_theft} jewels before the theft.
Thus, the dragon owned {jewels_before_theft} + {crown_jewels_stolen} = <<{jewels_before_theft}+{crown_jewels_stolen}={jewels_in_end}>>{jewels_in_end} jewels in the end.
